name: mollie-commercetools-notification-module
author: Mollie
description: Integration between commercetools and mollie payment service provider

scripts.zip-gcp-function: npm ci && npm run build && cp build/gcpFunctionHandler.js build/index.js && npm run delete-specific-cloud-handlers && cp -R node_modules build/ && cd build && zip -r ../notification-module.zip . && rm index.js
scripts.zip-aws-lambda: npm ci && npm run build && cp build/lambdaHandler.js build/index.js && npm run delete-specific-cloud-handlers && cp -R node_modules build/ && cd build && zip -r ../notification-module.zip . && rm index.js
scripts.zip-azure-function: npm ci && npm run build && cp build/azureHandler.js build/index.js && npm run delete-specific-cloud-handlers && cp -R node_modules build/ && cd build && zip -r ../notification-module.zip . && rm index.js
